src:
Natho: Ako ne možeš da izdržiš pritisak, nemoj ni da igraš fudbal
Bibras objasnio i razloge za oscilacije u igri Partizana

03 Nov 2019

Malo se lakše diše u Humskoj 1. Poraz od Čukaričkog (2:1) koji je gotovo ugasio šampionske snove, zalečen je velikom pobedom i odličnom igrom u Humskoj protiv Vojvodine (4:0).
Sjajnu partiju, još jednu otkako je obukao crno-beli dres, pružio je Bibras Natho. Igrač za kojeg je trener Savo Milošević rekao da je rođeni vođa i da se sam nametnuo kao lider ekipe, kojeg saigrači prate. Natho je bio dvostruki strelac protiv Vojvodine, jedan gol je postigao s bele tačke, drugi na asistenciju Sadika.
Posle svega i on je malo odahnuo, ali dodaje da je tim igrao pod velikim pritiskom u prethodnom periodu.„Pre ovog meča izgubili smo važnu utakmicu od Čukaričkog, koju smo morali da dobijemo. Igrali smo pod velikim pritiskom prošle nedelje, ali to je deo fudbala. Ako ne voliš pritisak, ako ne možeš da ga izdržiš, onda nemoj ni da igraš fudbal. Veliki timovi i igrače se upravo vide i rađaju kada su pod presijom“, rekao je Natho za klupski sajt.
Vezista crno-belih je zadovoljan kako je njegov tim reagovao protiv Vojvodine na prethodni kiks u prvenstvu.„Želeli smo da pokažemo ko smo i gde pripadamo, posebno jer smo igrali na našem stadionu i drago mi je da je tim posle svega odlično reagovao. Igrali smo dobro, borili se do kraja, bili skoncentrisani i kao posledica toga usledio je i rezultat 4:0“.



Istakao je Natho da mu je prijalo što je postigao dva gola protiv Novosađana.„Naravno da je za mene veoma važno što sam postigao dva gola, posebno pri rezultatu 0:0. Znao sam koliko je ova utakmica važna za Partizan, odatle i moje reakcije posle golova, jer fudbal morate da igrate sa emocijama, da uživate u tome što radite“.
Imao je kapiten reprezentacije Izraela objašnjenje i zašto Partizan ne igra u kontinuitetu dobro, već ima prevelike uspone i padove u igri.„Razloga ima više. Kada na svaka tri dana igrate Evropu i domaću ligu, to nije lako, zbog psihičkog i fizičkog umora. Sve što sada prolazimo bi trebalo da bude za nauk mladim igračima, kojih ima mnogo u timu. Mislim da će nas sve ovo učiniti još boljim, pametnijim“.
Za Partizan sledi novi okršaj sa Mančester junajtedom. Pre desetak dana u Humskoj je bilo 1:0 za Engleze.„Idemo tamo da igramo našu igru. Svaki fudbaler mora da bude svestan, a znam da jesu, da u ovoj utakmici svako mora da bude najbolji, bolji od sebe do sada. Znam koliko svi želim da nastavimo sa dobrim rezultatima u Evropi. Sve ćemo učiniti da prođemo grupu“, poručio je Bibras Natho.
Foto: Starsport
text:
Natho: If you can't handle the pressure, don't play football
Bibras also explained the reasons for the oscillations in the game Partizan

03 Nov 2019

It is a little easier to breathe in Humska 1. The defeat of Cukaricki (2: 1), which almost extinguished the championship dreams, was healed by a great victory and a great game in Humska against Vojvodina (4: 0).
A great party, another since wearing the black and white jersey, was provided by Bibras Natho. The player, whom coach Savo Milosevic said is a born leader and has imposed himself as the leader of a team that his teammates follow. Natho was a double scorer against Vojvodina, one goal scored from a white spot, the other on Sadik's assist.
After all, he was a little relieved, but adds that the team played under a lot of pressure in the previous period. We played under a lot of pressure last week, but that's part of football. If you don't like pressure, if you can't stand it, then don't even play football. Big teams and players are just seeing and giving birth when they are under pressure, "Natho told the club's website.
The black and white midfielder is pleased with how his team reacted against Vojvodina in the previous championship match. "We wanted to show who we are and where we belong, especially since we played in our stadium and I'm glad the team responded after all. We played well, fought to the end, focused, and as a result a 4-0 result came. "



Natho pointed out that he enjoyed two goals against Novosadians. "Of course, it is very important to me that I scored two goals, especially at 0-0. I knew how important this game was to Partizan, hence my post-goal reactions, because you have to play football with emotion, to enjoy what you do. "
He had an Israel national team captain explain why Partizan is not playing well continuously, but has too many ups and downs in the game. "There are more reasons. When you play Europe and the home league every three days, it's not easy, because of your physical and mental fatigue. Everything we are going through now should be a lesson for young players, who have many on the team. I think all of this will make us even better, smarter. "
Partizan follows a new clash with Manchester United. About ten days ago Humska was 1-0 for the English. "Let's go there to play our game. Every footballer has to be aware, and I know they are, that in this game everyone has to be the best, better than themselves so far. I know how much we all want to keep up the good results in Europe. We will do everything we can to get past the group, "Bibras Natho said.
Photo: Starsport
